channel.title: mac on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in mac on Just a Memo

item.title: Mac里的文件复制到 NTFS 格式的移动硬盘里
item.description: Install Homebrew Install ntfs-3g brew update brew install ntfs-3g Install Fuse Box 在 https://osxfuse.github.io/ 下载安装 FUSE for macOS 3.10.2` 将原来系统的mount_nfs 备份为mount_nfs.orig sudo mv /sbin/mount_ntfs /sbin/mount_ntfs.orig //将原系文件改名备份 如

item.title: iTunes
item.description: Change iTunes Backup directory Default backup directory Move to “J:\My iPhone Backup\Backup”, Just create a softlink mklink /J “%APPDATA%\Apple Computer\MobileSync\Backup” “J:\My iPhone Backup\Backup”

item.title: Mac-mini Gentoo Linux Single Boot with Kernel Stub Installation
item.description: Mac Mini(late 2012) Install Gentoo Linux(single boot, kernel stub) USB Download admin iso Create Linux bootable usb stick Partiton (GPT must) [jtable] Device, Mount Point,Filesystem,Description /dev/sda1,not mounted,(bootloader),BIOS boot partition /dev/sda2,/boot/efi,fat32,EFI System Partition (ESP) where the EFI files will be held to boot into the bootloader 0xEE /dev/sda3,/,ext4,root partition for your system [/jtable] list partition $ parted (parted) print devices /dev/sda (500GB) /dev/sdb (250GB) /dev/sdc (15.6GB) $ select /dev/sda (parted) print

item.title: Mac Operations
item.description: Mac Operation create bootable mac usb In Application Download High Sierra apps Format usb stick with mac external file system In terminal: $ sudo /Applications/Install\ macOS\ High\ Sierra.app/Contents/Resources/createinstallmedia --volume /Volumes/Untitled --applicationpath /Applications/Install\ macOS\ High\ Sierra.app brew install with proxy export ALL_PROXY=127.0.0.1:8087 brew install chromedriver set HostName set /etc/hosts set hostname sudo scutil --set ComputerName newname sudo scutil --set LocalHostName newname sudo scutil --set HostName newname dscacheutil -flushcache find and replace
